sentences: Joan Mary Last  (12 January 1908 â€“ 9 October 2002) was an English music educator, author and  composer born in Littlehampton, Sussex.
She studied piano with Mathilde Verne and made her debut as a pianist at the Aeolian Hall in London in 1926.
She taught music at the Royal Academy of Music and was awarded an OBE in 1988 for services to music education.
